name: Daniel Kim
chief_complaint: Persistent fatigue for 6 months with non-restorative sleep and diffuse myalgias; difficulty concentrating in afternoons.
history: Hypothyroidism on levothyroxine with stable TSH last month. No recent infections. Minimal exercise. Weight gain of 5 kg over 1 year.
red_flags: No night sweats, no unexplained fevers, no focal neurologic deficits, no chest pain.
vitals: BP 126/78, HR 72, RR 14, BMI 29. Posture: forward head, rounded shoulders. Reduced thoracic extension.
goals: Improve energy, establish better sleep, begin graded activity without post-exertional malaise.
biomechanical: Cervicothoracic junction restriction, scapular dyskinesis, myofascial tightness pectorals and upper trapezius.
respiratory: Shallow upper-chest breathing, decreased diaphragmatic motion; mild dependent edema at ankles after long work days.
metabolic: Suboptimal sleep hygiene, irregular meals, high refined carbs, low protein; possible micronutrient gaps.
neurological: Sympathetic predominance; headaches 2x/week tension-type; hypersensitivity to stress.
behavioral: High job stress, limited daylight exposure, screen time before bed; motivated to adopt small habit changes.
